title: 042: Golbat
author: Chris Taylor
description:
You’re walking home alone, and in the dead of night, a moist drop touches your neck. You jump out of the way startled, but to no avail – you find yourself in the bowels of a blood thirsty creature – a creature known as Golbat the blood hat. 

Hosts: [Chris](https://twitter.com/DaLiquidSword), [Mark](https://www.twitch.tv/robobobatron), Chris

For more episodes and the full ranking list visit [Magmar Sucks](http://www.magmarsucks.com) on the web.

For more on the Pokemon in this episode check out their [Bulbapedia page](http://bulbapedia.bulbagarden.net/wiki/Golbat_(Pokémon))
long_description:
You’re walking home alone, and in the dead of night, a moist drop touches your neck. You jump out of the way startled, but to no avail – you find yourself in the bowels of a blood thirsty creature – a creature known as Golbat the blood hat.
